# Summary
Senior Product Designer with 6+ years creating intuitive, accessible, and delightful user experiences for web and mobile platforms. Led design for products serving 10M+ users. Expert in design systems, user research, and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about inclusive design and mentoring junior designers.

# Work Experience

Jan 2022 – present

- Led redesign of Stripe Dashboard serving 3M+ merchants, improving task completion rate by 35 percent

- Mentored 3 junior designers, 2 promoted to mid-level within one year

- Designed accessible components meeting WCAG 2.1 AA standards, improving accessibility score from 72 to 94

- Led design critiques and workshops improving team design quality and velocity

## **Product Designer**, Spotify -- New York, NY

June 2018 – Feb 2020
